name: aisbreaker-core-nodejs
description: This package contains core services and adapters for AIsBreaker with dependeny to the AIsBreaker API. For NodeJS. AIsBreaker provides an easy-to-use and service-agnostic API to access different AI services (like OpenAI/ChatGPT API, Open-Assistant API, Google Bart API and many more) in a uniform way. More details: https://aisbreaker.org/

scripts.startChat: date --iso-8601=seconds && npm run build && date --iso-8601=seconds && node build/startChat.js
scripts.startImage: date --iso-8601=seconds && npm run build && date --iso-8601=seconds && node build/startImage.js
scripts.startTest: date --iso-8601=seconds && npm run build && date --iso-8601=seconds && node build/startTest.js
scripts.//test: # execute unit tests only (i.e. no integration tests) because this script is part of the normal build pipeline - without 3rd-party API keys
scripts.unit-tests: npm run build && npm run unit-tests-without-build
scripts.connector-integration-tests: npm run build && npm run connector-integration-tests-without-build

author: aisbreaker
